      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjacentEnemyHandler()
      This is a method to fill in surrounding enemy in the ListView
      void AllOut()
      This method is used to roll dice automatically after the player chooses the attacker and defender It will stop when either the attacker has not enough army or the defender is conquered

      this method is necessary for clearing combobox for dice roll

      This method sets the GamePhaseModel to fortification, which notifies the subscribed GameController to set new scene

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice(int diceattack,
                     int dicedefend,
                     Country attackingCountry,
                     Country defendingCountry)
        This method rolls dices of attacker and defender at attack phase. The number of armies of both countries decreases according to the rolling results
        Parameters:
        diceattack - The number of dice attacker wants to roll
        dicedefend - The number of dice defender wants to roll
        attackingCountry - The country which invokes the attack
        defendingCountry - The country which is attacked

      • AllOut

        public void AllOut()
        This method is used to roll dice automatically after the player chooses the attacker and defender It will stop when either the attacker has not enough army or the defender is conquered

      • goToFortificationPhase

        public void goToFortificationPhase()
        This method sets the GamePhaseModel to fortification, which notifies the subscribed GameController to set new scene
        Parameters:
        event - listens for click event

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        This method is necessary for getting update from card exchange
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
